capability.name: Limit And Exposure Management
capability.definition: Limit and Exposure Management capability provides oversight and control of corporate limits and exposures across all business activities. It ensures that business operations remain within defined risk parameters and exposure limits.
capability.role: Oversee corporate limits and exposures for the combined business activity
capability.example: Product fulfillment activity triggers limit and exposure checks
